document.full_text: food, beverage and household products companies have been pressured for months by rising commodity costs and their stocks have paid the price, but kimberly-clark corp  showed on monday things could be even worse.
document.title: commodities crunch worsens for consumers and companies
lines_and_colors: food, beverage and household products companies have been pressured for months by rising commodity costs and their stocks have paid the price, but kimberly-clark corp  showed on monday things could be even worse.
